title: Design and Implementation Project for International Partnership Strategies in SMEs

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of International Business Fundamentals and SME Management Experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening the capability to develop international partnership strategies through real-world case analysis. Constructs a collaborative learning environment using personal digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain strategic approaches for the three key elements of international partnership formation: internal stakeholder roles, planning/opportunity management, and organizational learning.
Learners can develop regionally optimized (manufacturing/service-based) international partnership models based on case studies.
Learners can create actionable partnership roadmaps under resource constraints through team projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
